ref: 6546 dēvŕ̊ m. ʻ husband's younger brother ʼ RV. (dēvan- lex.). 2. dēvará -- (and dḗ˚) ĀśGr̥. (˚aka -- Ujjval.). 3. *dēvraka -- (for formation cf. *jāmātraka -- s.v. jāˊmātr̥ -- ).
K. dyāra<-> (< acc. *dēvāram replacing dēváram) in cmpds. dyārathar ʻ husband's brother's son ʼ, dyāraz ʻ h.'s b.'s daughter ʼ.
